function EP02_15()
    --.承-9【5月第3週】「神は死んだ」
    SaveData.Title = "神は死んだ"

    --//BG：男子部教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩１～３号
    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01aa")

    MSG([[ That day, the boys' division suddenly switched to self-study. The teachers prioritized the girls' division, so this was not unusual in the boys' division. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, the handouts prepared for self-study were wonderfully thorough, covering even the smallest details, and I thought it was truly a prestigious school. ]])

    MSG([[ The seniors, Ouga, and I quietly sat at our desks, solving the handouts while helping each other with parts we didn’t understand. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015be")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,200,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0086.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Minato, what’s this problem about? Its difficulty has my muscles screaming." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0308.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal "Yeah. That problem is tough. It’s apparently from past Tokyo University entrance exams." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0309.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Smiling "But actually, it’s just a combination of simple formulas. Look, try splitting it into these parts and think about it?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_OGA01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0087.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Smiling "I see, that was a blind spot. Sugawara-sensei really knows how to include tricky questions." ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MA101ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,900,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,700,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0020.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Panicked "I-I don’t understand a single question! Minato-dono! Please, throw us a lifeline!" ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0310.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile "Okaaay, I’m coming now~" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ Actually, I had done the same handout during lunch in the girls' division, so I knew all the solutions. ]])

    MSG([[ Because of that, during self-study I usually ended up teaching everyone like this. ]])

    MSG([[ Teaching others helps me study a lot too, and it makes me happy that everyone appreciates it. ]])

    MSG([[ Recently, I’d even thought that maybe becoming a teacher in the future wouldn’t be so bad. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0311.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Smiling "After all, it’s nice to be my true self." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0088.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "What’s up, Minato? You seem unusually cheerful." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0312.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Smiling "Nothing. Don’t worry about it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The best thing about the boys' division is that I can live as a “man.” ]])

    MSG([[ Lately, whether weekends or weekdays, I spend more than half the day crossdressing. ]])

    MSG([[ So much so that it’s hard to tell which should be called my true self—Minato Ikusa or Erika Ikusa—since “Erika Ikusa” has invaded so much of my life. ]])

    MSG([[ The boys' division is as much a place for me to relax as Akira’s house. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0313.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Smiling (In the boys' division, I don’t have to lie or put on an act.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0314.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Smiling (Ah, God... please protect this sanctuary.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --//BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0071.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "Oh? Is it prayer time here in the boys' division?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0072.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Smiling "Although Yuriai left the missionary tradition long ago, such devotion is admirable. I’ll pray with you... that you may remain devoted to Erika-kun." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0315.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "...Oh." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0073.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "Oh?" ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0316.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Panicked "Oh my gooooooooooooooood!?!!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ My prayer failed to reach the heavens and vanished into mist. ]])

    MSG([[ Why is Daria-san in the boys' division? It was so unexpected that I couldn’t think of anything to say. ]])
    --//BU：ダリア（通常）、リラ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,600,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0121.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Panicked "Hey! Daria-senpai, this is bad! If it gets out that you met with the boys' division, even we girls will get scolded!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0074.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "Hey hey. You were the one who said you wanted to meet Erika-kun’s cousin, weren’t you?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0122.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Panicked "W-Well, that’s true, but I never thought you'd just barge in directly without any plan..." ]])

    MSG([[ Even Lira-san?! What the heck is going on here? ]])

    MSG([[ C-Could it be that my true identity has been discovered...? No, judging by their attitude, that doesn’t seem to be the case. ]])

    MSG([[ But both of them are glancing at me weirdly. What do they want with me in my male form? ]])
    --//BU：オウガ（通常）、ダリア（通常）、リラ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0089.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Quiet down, you weeds. Class is in session. If you want to chat, do it outside." ]])

    MSG([[ Ouga-kun sternly scolds the two of them. But his aggressive tone makes me a bit nervous. ]])

    MSG([[ More... gently... ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0123.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Sad "S-Sorry, we’ll go right away. It’s just that... my little sister..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0075.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "You’re Rokujou Ouga, right? Don’t be so stiff." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0076.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "Sorry, but just sleep for a bit." ]])

    MSG([[ As Daria-san looked at Ouga-kun, she brushed aside her bangs covering her eyes. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san’s special move? The "<r=アーサーズ・>Look of the Princess Knight</r><r=キス>Gaze</r>"—is she going to put him to sleep?! ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0317.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Panicked "Ouga-kun! Don’t look Daria-san in the eyes, it’s dangerous!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0090.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "What? Suddenly showing your eyeballs is ridiculous. If you want to show off, show your muscles." ]])

    MSG([[ Yet Ouga-kun doesn’t budge. He opens his shirt wider, taunting with a provocative smile. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san, dumbfounded, took a step back. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0077.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Surprised "I see, you’re the type with your own unique sense of beauty." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01pa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0091.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Loud laugh "Haaahaha! A king must naturally have a firm sense of beauty!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0092.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Loud laugh "To me, beauty is muscles! I myself am beauty! You weeds can twist and flirt all you want but I won’t be moved!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01fa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0124.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Irritated "That really grinds my gears. You shouldn’t underestimate girls so much, you overexposed gorilla." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0093.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "What did you say? Mocking me, the king... that deserves death!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0094.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "At least call me the overexposed muscle gorilla, you weak weeds!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0318.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile, sweat "Exposure and gorilla are separate concepts, huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ba")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0078.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Serious "Step aside, Minato-kun. This is a matter between us and the overexposed muscle gorilla." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san, Daria-san, and Ouga-kun glared at each other. The atmosphere was tense, ready to explode. ]])

    MSG([[ But at that moment, an unexpected person stepped in between them. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    --//BU：♂マスク先輩たち（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015be")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_MAA01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0021.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Panicked "W-Wait! It’s too tragic for schoolmates to fight!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0011.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Panicked "Indeed. Let’s discuss this calmly." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0319.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Surprised "Mask Senpai #1, Mask Senpai #2!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ The seniors stopped Ouga-kun and the others, speaking to them gently. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_MAA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0022.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "Ouga-dono, while it’s not admirable to appear during our lesson, the aggressive attitude is unacceptable." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0012.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Normal "Though our genders differ, we are all students of Yuriai Private Academy. Since it’s a rare opportunity, let’s get along." ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone there, including me, was surprised by the seniors' calm and reasonable tone. ]])

    MSG([[ But I had come to understand, after spending time with them, that they were sensible people. ]])

    MSG([[ Despite their suspicious appearance, they treated us juniors without arrogance, equally. They were truly good seniors. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ba")
    --//BU：♂マスク先輩たち、リラ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0125.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Surprised "Ah... ah..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0023.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "You must be Hime Gal, Lira Hoozuki." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0013.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Normal "I’ve heard about you from Minato-dono. Let’s become friends." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0011.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #3】Normal "Hehe... we are... friends." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG015ba")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_POSITION(200,0,0)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR01ga")
    LAYER_SCALE(201,150,150)
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,265)
    SET_CUTIN_07_XL(35, 60, 35, 500)
    RIR_PARTICLE_02(202, "BUL_RIR01ga", 265, 300)
    RIR_PARTICLE_01(250, 0, 0, 100, 150)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0126.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Sad "Kyaa!!! No way! Gross! Sit down!" ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_07_01(500)
    RESET_RIR_PARTICLE(201, 250)

    --//SE：何かが倒れる音
--PLAY_SE("SEc009.wav")
--WAIT(200)
LAYER_EFFECT(65,6,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0002")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1・2・3】 "Gyaaaaaaaaaaaa!?" ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(65,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,-400,-200,500,Ease.InCubic)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    PLAY_SE("SEc009.wav")

    --//BU：リラ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,false)

    MSG([[ By Lira-san’s "command," the seniors crawled on the floor. ]])

    MSG([[ ...Yeah. This was bound to happen. It’s unfortunate, but I understand. ]])

    MSG([[ Anyone would reject such strange masked people approaching them. ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to the seniors' intervention, the tense atmosphere eased and turned into a casual chat mood. ]])

    --//BU：ダリア（通常）、リラ（通常）、オウガ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    --LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_OGA01aa")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0079.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "Sorry to cause a commotion during class. Today I really just intended a simple greeting." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0320.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile, sweat "Ah! No, no! It’s because I panicked and made a fuss..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0127.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Surprised "...You’re really a nice person. It’s scary how much you’re just like Erika. Bloodline is seriously no joke." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san stared at me excessively. I got nervous, thinking my true identity might be exposed. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0321.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Panicked "B-By the way, why are you two in the boys' division?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0080.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "There were rumors in the girls' division that Erika-kun’s cousin, who looks just like him, was in the boys' division. As a beauty lover, I had to see him for myself." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0081.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Smiling "I’m relieved you’re as beautiful as the rumors said. Aren’t you actually a girl who entered disguised as a boy?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0322.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile "No." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Rather, it’s the other way around. The sharp but off-target question nearly made me laugh. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0082.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "But wait. Do you know the story of Schrödinger’s cat?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0083.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Normal "If there’s something whose result is unknown until observed, it means multiple possibilities overlap." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0084.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Serious "In other words, unless you undress Minato-kun, he is both a boy and a girl... isn’t that right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0323.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Panicked "What are you talking about!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Daria-san ignored my objection and fixed her moist gaze on me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0085.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Serious "Sorry. When I’m curious, I have to taste it myself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0095.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Ouga】Normal "Hmph. You’ve got some nerve trying to attack my important friend. I won’t let you lay a finger on Minato." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0086.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Daria】Serious "How rude... I won’t touch him. But I will <r=い>insert</r>." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0324.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Panicked "What are you talking about!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0001.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】 "That’s unacceptable!" ]])
    --//BU：先輩たち
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MAA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(65,0,0,500,Ease.InCubic)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ The seniors stepped in again between Ouga-kun and Daria-san. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah, they’re trying to mediate again. They really are juniors who care. ]])

    MSG([[ I felt like crying from their kindness. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0025.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #1】Normal "I cannot possibly accept treating Minato-dono as gender-neutral." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0015.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #2】Normal "Minato-dono is..." ]])

    --//Effectフォント大
    -- wiz : 要検討
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015be")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BUL_MAA01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0013.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Mask Senpai #3】Normal "Male because he’s got one!!!" ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(65,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0325.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Sad "............" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ For the first time in my life, I cried from sheer exasperation. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG015ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ And then the verbal battle between Ouga-kun, Daria-san, and the others resumed. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0128.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wry smile, sweat "Don’t space out. Those idiots might wander off while arguing." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001",1000,false)

    --//BG：男子部校舎前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG021ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Since I was the source of the fire, Lira-san led me quietly out of the school building. ]])
    --//BU：リラ（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0129.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Sad "Seriously, they’re all so dumb. I can’t even poke fun at them properly." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0326.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Wry smile, sweat "They’re good people, though." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0130.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Lira】Wry smile "Yeah... I get that, but next time we visit, I’ll try harder to keep Daria-senpai in check." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san smiled awkwardly. ]])

    MSG([[ — Visiting again. Hearing that made me half worried, half happy. ]])

    MSG([[ I was anxious about meeting the girls’ division in my true male form and risking exposure, but it was honestly nice to get along with them as myself. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0327.wav")
    MSG([[ 【Minato】Normal "Oh, by the way, why did you come to the boys' division, Lira-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR01ca")
